sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import AccountPopup from "./accountPopup"; import PersonAddTwoToneIcon from '@material-ui/icons/PersonAddTwoTone'; import PeopleAltTwoToneIcon from '@material-ui/icons/PeopleAltTwoTone'; import PersonOutlineTwoToneIcon from '@material-ui/icons/PersonOutlineTwoTone'; import { CSVLink } from "react-csv"; class PersonalInfo extends Component { componentDidMount() { fetch(`http://oko-api.herokuapp.com/account/users/${this.state.credentials.username}`, { method: 'GET', headers: { //'Authorization': 'Token 53aaf969d1e6ee660f11a9cb99da97338232d86e' } }).then(resp => resp.json()) .then(resp => this.setState({ userAccount: resp })) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } userAccountClicked = a => { console.log(a) } inputChanged = event => { let cred = this.state.credentials; cred[event.target.name] = event.target.value; this.setState({ credentials: cred }); } setGoal = () => { console.log(this.state.credentials); fetch(`https://oko-api.herokuapp.com/account/users/${this.state.credentials.username}`, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(this.state.credentials) }).then(resp => resp.json()) .then(res => this.props.newGoal(res)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } newGoal = goal => { this.setState({ goal: [...this.state.goal, goal] }); } render() { return (
{this.state.userAccount.map(userAccount => { const first_name = userAccount.first_name; const surname = userAccount.surname; const name = `${first_name} ${surname}`; const username = userAccount.username; const tel = userAccount.phone_number; const email = userAccount.email; const password = userAccount.password; const code = userAccount.dwelling_code; const incent_choice = userAccount.incentivisation_choice; const goal = userAccount.goal; let logged_in = userAccount.logged_in; const csvData = [ [name], [username], [tel], [email], [password], [code], [incent_choice], [goal] ]; function setGoalText() { if (incent_choice === 'HE') { return ( Set your goal for how much energy you want to save in kWh, per month ); } else if (incent_choice === 'SM') { return ( Set your goal for how much money you want to save in £, per month ); } } if (code === "ABC-XYZ") { if (logged_in === true) { return (
Set Your Goal
{setGoalText()}
Please enter your goal:


Admin Account Types Different admin privileges
Super-Admin See other account members details and set permissions Admin See other account members details Non-Admin See other account members names CHANGE YOUR ACCOUNT TYPE

Signing in An added level of security to ensure you are the only person that can access your account
TWO-STEP VERIFICATION 		Life Time Data Download a CSV file to see your lifetime data. This will show you what information is being stored about your account.
DOWNLOAD YOUR DATA
Signing in An added level of security to ensure you are the only person that can access your account or to reach out if there is suspicious activity in your account.
TWO-STEP VERIFICATION

Life Time Data Download a CSV file to see your lifetime data. This will show you what information is being stored about your account.
DOWNLOAD YOUR DATA


Personal information Information stored on you which can be edited or delete at any time.

Name: {name}
Username: {username}
Password: *****
Phone Number: {tel}
Email Address: {email}
Incentivisation Choice: {incent_choice}
Goal {goal}
EDIT YOUR INFO

); } } })}
); } } export default PersonalInfo;
